name: skittle
content:
skittles [ U ]
Add to word list
Add to word list
a game played especially in Britain in which players roll a ball at objects shaped like bottles to try to knock them down and score points: Would you like a game of skittles?
See more
[ C ] one of a set of objects shaped like bottles that are knocked down with a ball as part of a game
